document_data.mainbody:
orch Street was a curved street in the city of Suzail that ran parallel to Blade Lane, not far from the citys eastern edge.
Torch Street began on the crossing of Stonebow Street and a Y-shaped Swordstars Lane to the north. From there, the street moved south, past the Street of Staves, and came to an end in front of The Lockup, Suzails prison.
*Ring of Coins, a pawnshop with a wide selection of goods. The store stood on Torch Street, before being relocated to the Court Close in the 15 century DR.
